description: Trip Assignment (US-027) requires a Trip record to exist, which is created by US-026.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire trip execution workflow.

description: E-Invoicing (US-037) can only be triggered after a trip is 'Completed', which is a state reached after POD Upload (US-052).
mitigation_plan: Sprints are ordered to respect this dependency.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire trip-to-cash financial cycle.

description: The Continuous Deployment pipeline cannot deploy the application until the target EKS cluster (WI-028) is provisioned.
mitigation_plan: Develop deployment scripts against a local K8s cluster (Minikube) in parallel.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all application deployments to staging/production.

description: Payment Recording (US-039) is performed against an invoice created by the E-Invoicing story (US-037).
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the financial workflow.
